name: UDP Services are restricted from the Internet
query: { securityGroups(where: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", action: "Allow", protocol: "UDP", OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "tag:Internet"}, {sources: []}]}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
